title: Great myths & legends (PC)
creator_credit: Nexus Interactions, EMME Interactive, Christophe Queant and Christophe Pascal
brief_description: This 2 CD ROM set covers monsters and mythical creatures, legendary lands and lost cities. Volume 1 covers the yeti, minotaur, Loch Ness Monster, cyclops, leviathan, pegasus, golem, unicorn, gorgon and phoenix. Volume 2 covers the lands and lost cities of Atlantis, Tower of Babel, Easter Island, Eldorado, Bermuda Triangle, Labryinth of Daedalus, Stonehenge, Herod’s Temple, Garden of Eden and the Fountain of Youth.
